message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it'll be a valuable asset to your business. Let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm confident that the product will be a valuable asset to my business, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. Can you meet me at $900,000?

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $900,000 is still a bit low for me. How about we split the difference at $950,000? I'm confident that this product will be a valuable addition to your business, and I'm willing to work with you to find a price that works for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $950,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $920,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer, and I believe this price reflects the value the product will bring to my business. Can you consider this revised offer?
